definition: eye/small hole/crux (of a matter)/CL:隻|只[zhi1],雙|双[shuang1]/classifier for big hollow things (wells, stoves, pots etc)

sentences.english: Wore invisible glasses wears sunglasses again, does cross-eye eyeball have disadvantage?
sentences.chinese: 戴了隐形眼镜再戴墨镜，对眼睛有坏处吗？

sentences.english: With the refreshing and mild quality, it is especially suitable to the people with sensitive eye skin or wearing the contact lenses.
sentences.chinese: 质地清爽温和，尤其适合配带隐形眼镜人士使用。

sentences.english: As she placed one in her left eye she halted and stared into the mirror intently.
sentences.chinese: 她左眼戴上隐形眼镜，对着镜子仔细地端详。

sentences.english: Hold it! You almost stepped on my contact lens!
sentences.chinese: 站着别动，你差点踩在我的隐形眼镜上。

sentences.english: Hoping to get free contact lenses, Freddy goes to the optician.
sentences.chinese: 弗瑞德到眼镜商那儿希望能得到免费的隐形眼镜。

sentences.english: Youhua contact lens case set series designed and manufactured with innovation and highest quality.
sentences.chinese: 有华以创新和精工工艺设计生产隐形眼镜护理盒系列。

sentences.english: A type of contact lens that can correct vision was recently launched in Spain.
sentences.chinese: 西班牙日前推出了一款号称可矫正视力的隐形眼镜。

sentences.english: The bizarre range features a number of adornments which hang on wire from contact lenses.
sentences.chinese: 这串奇异的装饰物可以挂在隐形眼镜上。

sentences.english: Don't pop out contact lenses but just tense them.
sentences.chinese: 别隐形眼镜瞪出来，只是绷紧他们。

sentences.english: I want to buy the lotion for contact lens.
sentences.chinese: 我想买瓶隐形眼镜护理液。

sentences.english: Julia adjusted her invisible bifocal glasses and entered the classroom.
sentences.chinese: 茱莉亚调整了一下自己的双光隐形眼镜。

sentences.english: Glasses or contact lenses are your first option.
sentences.chinese: 眼镜或者隐形眼镜是你的首选。

sentences.english: He can't afford contacts, so he acts half-blind.
sentences.chinese: 他不能戴隐形眼镜，只好半瞎着演戏。

sentences.english: Contact lens wearers should consult their doctor before use.
sentences.chinese: 隐形眼镜配戴者使用前应咨询医生。

sentences.english: Have the nearsighted patient of astigmatism, can you adorn invisible glasses?
sentences.chinese: 患有散光的近视患者，能佩戴隐形眼镜吗？

sentences.english: Now many nearsighted patient wear contact lenses.
sentences.chinese: 现在不少近视患者配戴隐形眼镜。

definition: cosmetic contact lens/big eye contact lens/circle contact lens
to have a pair of prescription glasses made
to put on/to wear (mouthguard, contact lenses, hearing aid etc)
